items.sentence: Tom didn't know how to do that until he was thirteen years old.
The cookies that Tom baked this afternoon are really delicious.
I think that I'll always be stronger at French than at English.
They only allow you to visit patients for thirty minutes a day.
Tom didn't seem to be paying attention to what Mary was saying.
Tom didn't even seem to realize that he'd hurt Mary's feelings.
I've found an apartment about thirty minutes from where I work.
We're committed to finding a way to keep the bus service going.
Tom said he didn't want to go swimming because it was too cold.
Do you think that Tom likes taking the bus to school every day?
